title: What type of aircraft is used for flight AF 0442? - Quora

response.answer_text: CDG to GIG? Looks like most of the time it is a 777–300, but sometimes they move it to a 777–200. Best to look it up on a flight information site, I light Flight Radar 24 myself. It can change before the departure, I personally like to check up to the day of a flight to see if they swap anything so I can double check my seat assignment.
